842c9777-3a75-493a-9185-4d5ce105da0d.description: Cohort 10 represents a significant milestone for the IDOL courses Academy℠, our team, staff, and students. The IDOL courses Academy℠ was started in July 2019 as a way to help people make the transition to corporate instructional design and online learning. Since then, our program has expanded, improved, and upgraded to a recognized and authorized vocational trade school. We are thrilled with the success of our alumni from cohorts past and we're eager to see where the alumni of cohort 10 end up!
842c9777-3a75-493a-9185-4d5ce105da0d.name: IDOL courses Academy℠: Commemorative 10th Cohort Badge

3ba1e978-a321-45b4-aab0-e809a30a2076.description: One way that IDOL courses® works to achieve our mission is by offering experience opportunities to the next generation of learning developers - our students. IDOL courses provides a framework and support for students working together as a team to design and develop a training solution. The completed projects are available to non-profit organizations free of charge. Earners have demonstrated the ability to self-organize, show up, and self-direct an eLearning course from start to finish.
3ba1e978-a321-45b4-aab0-e809a30a2076.name: IDOL World Project Volunteer

badge_template_activities.title: All members of the team are IDOL courses Academy members or alumni. The exception is the SME, who might be alumni, or who might be from outside the Academy if the team can find someone willing to donate their time. These students work directly with an organization or a SME to analyze, design and develop a training solution that will benefit a specific organization or the non-profit world at large.

Earners must contribute the the IDOL world project in a significant way from start to finish of the project. Only those that regularly communicate, deliver artifacts on schedule, and work consistently on the project are eligible for this badge.
IDOL World Project volunteers work with subject matter experts to create instruction and training that is used by non-profit organizations.
